actions.description: The deep crow makes three attacks: one with its mandibles and two with its claws.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 17). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the deep crow can't use its mandibles on another target.
actions.name: Mandibles

actions.description: 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage.
actions.name: Claw

specialTraits.description: The deep crow has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
specialTraits.name: Magic Resistance

specialTraits.description: While in dim light or darkness, the deep crow can take the Hide action as a bonus action.
specialTraits.name: Shadow Stealth

specialTraits.description: While in sunlight, the deep crow has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.
specialTraits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
